history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: eq,forall_relim. apply flip_relim. qsimpl time: 1 use: eq,forall_relim. sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: apply forall_relim with (e := @eq V). simpl. intros. apply flip_relim. apply H.
